ProfilePicturePath.Description: webserver directory for storing profile pictures

AdhocSignerURL.Description: API endpoint for posting files for adhoc signing

SignerURL.Description: API endpoint for posting files for signing with pre-configured options. Add the name of the profile you want to use for signing to the API path, e.g. http://host:port/api/Signer/RequestSigning/profileName

VerifyURL.Description: API endpoint for posting files for verifying signature
